snippet.title: Unaware - From Past to Present
snippet.description:
Unaware is a first person horror puzzle experience.

Introduction:
The player wakes up after a horrific nightmare. He finds himself alone in a bed within a room. On the drawer to the left he notices an unlit candle. He doesn’t exactly know where he is. He looks confused around and doesn't recognize anything in the room. After getting up he starts to feel the cold from the floorboards and weakness in his body. He is hungry too.
The player has amnesia.

#horrorgaming #indie #firstperson #puzzles #devlog
